diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $NQ$ is $3x + 2$ units.
The length of the line $QL$ is $12$ units.
The length of the line $NM$ is $2y + 5$ units.
The length of the line $RQ$ is $3y$ units.
The length of the line $ML$ is the same as $w$ units.
The length of the line $RM$ is $4x - 2$ units.
Point $L$ lies on the line connecting $N$ and $R$.
Point $L$ also lies on the line connecting $Q$ and $M$.
line_instances: There are lines $ML$, $NL$, $NM$, $NQ$, and $NR$, forming the parallelogram and its diagonals.
The line $NM$ and $RQ$ are the diagonals of the parallelogram $NQRM$
